scripts.dev: npm run clean-build && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json -outDir build && shx cp package.json build
scripts.dev-test: npm run clean-build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run test
scripts.clean: npm run clean-index && npm run clean-src && npm run clean-test
scripts.clean-index: shx rm -rf index.d.ts index.js index.js.map server.d.ts server.js server.js.map
